refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkNotebook widget is a GtkContainer whose children are pages that can be switched between using tab labels along one edge.

There are many configuration options for GtkNotebook. Among other things, you can choose on which edge the tabs appear (see gtk_notebook_set_tab_pos()), whether, if there are too many tabs to fit the noteobook should be made bigger or scrolling arrows added (see gtk_notebook_set_scrollable), and whether there will be a popup menu allowing the users to switch pages. (see gtk_notebook_enable_popup(), gtk_noteobook_disable_popup())

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_next_page ()
refsect2.para: Switches to the next page. Nothing happens if the current page is the last page.

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_prev_page ()
refsect2.para: Switches to the previous page. Nothing happens if the current page is the first page.

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_reorder_child ()
refsect2.para: Reorders the page containing child, so that it appears in position position. If position is greater than or equal to the number of children in the list or negative, child will be moved to the end of the list.

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook
the child to move
the new position, or -1 to move to the end

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_set_tab_pos ()

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook.
the edge to draw the tabs at.

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs ()
refsect2.para: Sets whether to show the tabs for the notebook or not.

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook
TRUE if the tabs should be shown.

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_set_show_border ()
refsect2.para: Sets whether a bevel will be drawn around the notebook pages. This only has a visual effect when the tabs are not shown. See gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs().

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook
TRUE if a bevel should be drawn around the notebook.

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_set_scrollable ()

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook

warning.para: gtk_notebook_set_tab_border is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the width the border around the tab labels in a notebook. This is equivalent to calling gtk_notebook_set_tab_hborder (notebook, border_width) followed by gtk_notebook_set_tab_vborder (notebook, border_width).

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook
width of the border around the tab labels.

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_popup_enable ()
refsect2.para: Enables the popup menu: if the user clicks with the right mouse button on the bookmarks, a menu with all the pages will be popped up.

refsect2.title: gtk_notebook_popup_disable ()

listitem.simpara: a GtkNotebook
